name: onboarding-improvements
goal: Ship a phased onboarding strategy with clear stream boundaries across onboarding shell, rapid context dump, and people intelligence, with measurable phase gates and governance.

userStories.title: Lock stream boundaries and ownership
userStories.description: Finalize and publish explicit stream ownership boundaries (A onboarding shell, B rapid context dump, C people intelligence), ensure task-to-stream mapping rules are explicit, and document independent shippability constraints.
acceptanceCriteria: Stream ownership table is explicit in umbrella PRD
Task-to-single-primary-stream mapping rule is documented
Independent shippability constraints are defined

userStories.title: Finalize onboarding-mvp baseline + deltas
userStories.description: Anchor onboarding stream to dev/backlog/features/onboarding-mvp.md and document explicit deltas for website + context dump extension while keeping self-guided infrastructure out of Phase 1.
acceptanceCriteria: Baseline reference to onboarding-mvp is explicit
Path A delta includes company website + context dump handoff
Phase 1 excludes self-guided infrastructure

userStories.title: Specify Rapid Context Dump MVP interface
userStories.description: Define supported inputs, outputs, fallback matrix, and review-before-promote guardrails in child/umbrella PRDs for Stream B.
acceptanceCriteria: Inputs include website URL, inputs/onboarding-dump/, and pasted text
Outputs include draft context files, draft strategy summary, and review checklist
Fallback matrix and review-before-promote behavior are explicit

userStories.title: Specify People Intelligence MVP foundations
userStories.description: Define unknown queue, evidence-backed recommendations, and non-blocking digest review behavior with uncertainty-safe classification model in child PRD for Stream C.
acceptanceCriteria: Unknown queue is first-class and default for low-confidence items
Recommendation evidence/rationale requirements are explicit
Batch/digest review default and non-blocking behavior are documented

userStories.title: Define lightweight cross-stream contracts
userStories.description: Document v1 contract schema connecting onboarding profile capture and context dump hints to people intelligence consumers, including ownership and graceful-degradation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Contract v1 fields and ownership are explicit
Onboarding-exported profile fields and context-hint payloads are documented
Graceful degradation behavior is defined when dependencies are absent

userStories.title: Define 3-phase delivery gates and independent ship checks
userStories.description: Convert strategic phases into explicit gates, include user-visible win per phase, and add ship checks proving stream independence.
acceptanceCriteria: Phase 1/2/3 gates are explicit with deliverables
Each phase has measurable user-visible win
Ship checks verify streams can release independently

userStories.title: Finalize KPI thresholds and kill criteria
userStories.description: Define numeric KPI thresholds and explicit continue/pause criteria for each stream in umbrella and child PRDs.
acceptanceCriteria: Numeric KPI thresholds are present for onboarding, context dump, and people intelligence
Continue/pause kill criteria are explicit and testable
Metric collection points are aligned with phase gates

userStories.title: Execution handoff package
userStories.description: Prepare final handoff artifacts for execute-prd: umbrella + child PRDs linked, pre-mortem attached, task list synchronized, and review summary captured.
acceptanceCriteria: Umbrella PRD links all child PRDs and source plan
Pre-mortem and review artifacts are complete and up to date
Autonomous task list and progress tracking are initialized for execution
